attributes.action: Look into the way fixed penalty motoring offences are dealt with
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to the fact that about 35 years ago two police officers committed perjury against me (they worked from acocks green police station in birmingham) I think that it is absolutely imperative that all evidence concerning proof of fixed speeding penalties should be made available prior to a person paying or receiving points on their license. I have recently been a victim to this system of justice and i can only decribe it as demanding money with menaces and an infringement of my human rights.
